suite.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a set of rooms, especially expensive ones in a hotel
suite.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: a suite of rooms for palace guests
suite.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a set of matching furniture for a room
suite.translation[0].definitions[1].note: three-piece suite (=a large seat and two chairs)
suite.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a group of related computer programs
suite.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: a piece of music made up of several short parts
suite.translation[0].definitions[4].defi: the people who work for or help an important person
suite.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a set of rooms, especially expensive ones in a hotel or an office building
suite.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: The firm has a suite of offices on the second floor.
suite.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: a group of related computer programs that work together
suite.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: The system itself will comprise a suite of computer programs.
